i3pubtools.sources module¶

i3pubtools.sources.dec(sign, deg, mins, secs)¶

Converts declination to radians.

More function info…

Parameters

  • sign (int) – A positive integer for a positive sign, a negative integer for a negative sign.

  • deg (float) – Degrees.

  • mins (float) – Minutes.

  • secs (float) – Seconds.

Return type

float

Returns

Radian representation of declination.
